message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $1,000,000. Considering its high quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending a special offer to you. For a limited time only, you have the chance to secure this remarkable item at a price of $950,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its full value, making it an attractive proposition for you. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of facilitating this transaction. Kind regards, Alice
